main event: On 6th November 1957 in Newburgh, New York, a civilian reported seeing two saucer-shaped objects flying as a pair and maneuvering in the air for 10-12 seconds.
interesting points: The objects were described as saucer-shaped and flew together as a pair, maneuvering in the air.
The observation lasted for 10-12 seconds, providing a brief but clear sighting.
There were no additional details provided about the course or specific maneuvers of the objects.
The objects were reported to be silver and white in color, with one following the other.
The report suggests that the objects were initially believed to be a pair of fast movers before considering them to be a pair of fast fighters.
sighted object: Two saucer-shaped objects flying as a pair
